query:
UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Video content production for marketing campaigns requires outsourcing to production agencies at $15,000-25,000 per video. Production timeline is 6-8 weeks from concept to delivery. Marketing team needs 12-15 videos annually for campaigns but budget only allows 4-6 videos. Unable to create personalized video variations for different audience segments or A/B testing.',
  aiApproach = 'Build custom AI video production platform using generative AI for script writing, AI voice-over generation, automated video editing with brand templates, stock footage integration, and dynamic personalization. Platform enables in-house creation of professional marketing videos with minimal production expertise. Includes brand asset integration and multi-language support.',
  primaryUsers = 'Content Marketing Manager, Campaign Managers, Brand Marketing Team, Social Media Manager',
  currentWorkflow = '1) Develop video concept and script (2 weeks) 2) Agency RFP and vendor selection (1 week) 3) Agency production (4 weeks) 4) Review and revisions (1 week) 5) Final delivery and distribution (1 week). Total: 9 weeks, $20K per video',
  proposedWorkflow = '1) Input campaign goals and key messages (2 hrs) 2) AI generates script variations (automated) 3) Select footage and customize template (3 hrs) 4) AI generates video with voice-over (automated) 5) Review and minor edits (2 hrs) 6) Export and distribute (automated). Total: 1 week, $0 production cost',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates dependency on external agencies, dramatically reduces production time and cost, enables video A/B testing and personalization, increases video content volume',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce video production cost from $20K to near-zero per video, reduce timeline from 9 weeks to 1 week, increase video output from 4-6 to 20+ videos annually, enable personalized video variations for segment testing',
  processOwner = 'Content Marketing Manager',
  affectedTeams = '["Content Marketing", "Campaign Management", "Brand Marketing", "Social Media", "Creative Services"]',
  primaryMetric = 'cost_reduction',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: $120K annual video budget, 4-6 videos/year, 9-week production cycle, no personalization or A/B testing',
  successCriteria = '$20K annual platform cost, 20+ videos/year, 1-week production cycle, 5+ personalized variations per campaign, 85% quality satisfaction vs. agency work',
  measurementMethod = 'Cost tracking, production timeline monitoring, video output volume, engagement metrics (views, completion rate), quarterly stakeholder surveys',
  memberExperienceImpact = 'medium',
  brandDifferentiation = 'medium',
  operationalExcellence = 'medium',
  impactScale = 'department',
  impactBenefitType = 'Cost reduction, faster production, increased volume, personalization capability',
  impactFinancialReturn = 100000,
  feasibilityComplexity = 'high',
  feasibilityTimeline = '6-9 months',
  feasibilityDependencies = 'Custom platform development or enterprise AI video tool procurement, brand template creation, voice-over talent licensing, legal review of AI-generated content, extensive team training'
WHERE id = 6;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Video content production for marketing campaigns requires outsourcing to production agencies at $15,000-25,000 per video.
